title: After last patch andserver maintenance yesterday I have been having really high ping and packet loss
body:
After the last patch and yesterday's maintenance I went from ~52-55ping to ~80-90 ping and experiencing HUGE input lag.

I've seen entire  Reddit posts about this, and several other board posts? what should I do?

replies.body: That little mention of "input lag kind of makes me wonder if this is actual lag in internet speed or if something is getting in the way of your connection. Let's quickly test for some packet loss using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to clear that suspicion up first!
it said I had packet loss.

Weeeeell that's not good Dx! 

Most of the time packet loss happens due to some damaged or otherwise not properly working node that your ISP is sending your connection through to our servers. You might be able to reach out to your ISP to see if there are any current issues, but you can still reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if there's anything our tech team can help with!

Packet loss can cause some pretty weird shit to be quite honest xD. Sometimes you can have like 50% packet loss, but your fps and ping look perfect! Your other post mentioned being curious if it's being caused by hardware issues, and that's actually a possibility as well. 

I'd suggest hitting up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they'll be able to look into those network logs a little deeper. They can also guide you along troubleshooting your hardware to cover all your bases ^_^.
